TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void LoadBroadcastingHandler(string bundleID, string displayName, UIImage appIcon);
.class public auto ansi sealed LoadBroadcastingHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
type LoadBroadcastingHandler = delegate of string * string * UIImage -> unit

Docs.param: The bundle ID of the newly loaded broadcasting service.
The display name of the newly loaded broadcasting service.
The application icon of the newly loaded broadcasting service.
Docs.summary: Delegate that specifies the signature of the completion handler in calls to the method.
